searches.name: Hook - Peaked T-Waves
searches.context: This patient's EKG looks like Mount Everest - peaked T-waves everywhere

searches.name: Vignette - Potassium Crisis
searches.context: Potassium level comes back at 7.2 - kidney's on strike

searches.name: Danger - Heart Stopping
searches.context: The heart is about to throw in the towel - ventricular fibrillation incoming

searches.name: Question - What Do You Do
searches.context: TICK TOCK future doctors - what's your move?

searches.name: Answer Reveal - Calcium Gluconate
searches.context: It's CALCIUM GLUCONATE baby! Stabilize that cardiac membrane!

searches.name: Wrong Answer Roast
searches.context: Half of you reached for insulin first - that shifts potassium but doesn't stabilize the heart!

searches.name: Mechanism Explanation
searches.context: Calcium acts like a bodyguard for the heart - stabilizes the membrane while other treatments work

searches.name: Exit - Peace Out
searches.context: Now get outta here and save some lives
